expertise: Property Law Excl. Intellectual Property Law
Legal Theory Jurisprudence And Legal Interpretation
interest: Trustee's obligations and remedies for breaches of trustees' obligations. Common law adjudication, in particular the differences between 'judge made' law and legislation and the relationship/interaction between the two bodies of law. The structure of private law and the distinction between private law and public law. The law relating to charitable and religious institutions.
